title: The Music box
creator_credit: Barbara Tilley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Barbara Tilley’s moving story starts with how she and her brother moved in with her older sister, Marge, to avoid being sent to a home. Ever since that moment, Marge has been the family rock, the one keeping everyone strong through the changes and sadness and keeping the family’s spirit alive.
